alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:23PM CDT until May 13 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Fenton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River near Sullivan. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Arnold. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Near this height, New Baumgartner Road in front of the Fred Weber Quarry begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 27.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 27.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 32.1 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Arnold 24.0 27.7 30.6 31.9 32.1 30.9 26.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
